verses.verse: <S%H1945>Ah,<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6767>rustling<s%> of <S%H3671>wings,<s%> which is <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> of <S%H3568>Ethiopia;<s%>

that <S%H7971>sends<s%> <S%H6735>ambassadors<s%> by the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> even in <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H1573>papyrus<s%> <S%H6440>on<s%> the <S%H4325>waters,<s%> <S%H3212>saying,<s%> "Go, you <S%H7031>swift<s%> <S%H4397>messengers,<s%> to a <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H4900>tall<s%> and <S%H4178>smooth,<s%> to a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3372>awesome<s%> from their beginning <S%H1973>onward,<s%> a <S%H1471>nation<s%> that measures <S%H6978>out<s%> and treads <S%H4001>down,<s%> whose <S%H776>land<s%> the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> <S%H958>divide!<s%>"

All you <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H8398>world,<s%> and you <S%H7931>dwellers<s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%> when a <S%H5251>banner<s%> is lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> <S%H7200>look!<s%> When the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> is <S%H8628>blown,<s%> <S%H8085>listen!<s%>

<S%H3541>For<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8252>me,<s%> "I will be still, and I will <S%H5027>see<s%> in my dwelling <S%H4349>place,<s%> like <S%H6703>clear<s%> <S%H2527>heat<s%> in <S%H216>sunshine,<s%> like a <S%H5645>cloud<s%> of <S%H2919>dew<s%> in the <S%H2527>heat<s%> of <S%H7105>harvest.<s%>"

For <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H7105>harvest,<s%> when the <S%H6525>blossom<s%> is <S%H8552>over,<s%> and the <S%H5328>flower<s%> becomes a <S%H1580>ripening<s%> <S%H1155>grape,<s%> he will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H2150>sprigs<s%> with pruning <S%H4211>hooks,<s%> and he will cut <S%H8456>down<s%> and take <S%H5493>away<s%> the spreading <S%H5189>branches.<s%>

They will be <S%H5800>left<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> for the ravenous <S%H5861>birds<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and for the <S%H929>animals<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%> The ravenous <S%H5861>birds<s%> will <S%H6972>summer<s%> on <S%H929>them,<s%> and all the animals of the <S%H776>earth<s%> will winter on <S%H2778>them.<s%>

In that <S%H6256>time,<s%> a <S%H7862>present<s%> will be <S%H2986>brought<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> from a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H4900>tall<s%> and <S%H4178>smooth,<s%> even from a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3372>awesome<s%> from their beginning <S%H1973>onward,<s%> a <S%H1471>nation<s%> that measures <S%H6978>out<s%> and treads <S%H4001>down,<s%> whose <S%H776>land<s%> the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> <S%H958>divide,<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>
